cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 290 mi SSE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward well offshore, toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Newfoundland / eastern Nova Scotia (as a post-tropical system)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Offshore waters east of the Mid-Atlantic, southern New England coast, Nova Scotia, and Newfoundland
weather_observation.wind: Light peripheral breeze possible, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds are not expected at the port
